name: Juan The Mechanic vs The Robot Apocalypse
name_original: Juan The Mechanic vs The Robot Apocalypse
description:
- Story -

It is the year 2069.

The robots have turned against humanity.

It is the robot apocalypse.

Only one man can defeat the robots.

That man is juan the mechanic.

With his trusty chain he will teach the robots who is the boss.

Defeat all the robots to save humanity.

- Controls - 

Move with "A" and "D"

Jump with SPACE. To do a wall jump slide in a wall and press SPACE.

Light attack with "J". Heavy attack "K".

Grab Chains with "W". While grabbed Swing with "A" and "D". Jump with SPACE or Let go with "S".
